thread.title: Comment on Treehouse Donates $3 Million Worth of Tech Education to 2,500 College Students by Faye Bridge
thread.title_full: Comment on Treehouse Donates $3 Million Worth of Tech Education to 2,500 College Students by Faye Bridge

author: Faye Bridge
title: Comment on Treehouse Donates $3 Million Worth of Tech Education to 2,500 College Students by Faye Bridge
text:
Treehouse Donates $3 Million Worth of Tech Education to 2,500 College Students  //blog.teamtreehouse.com/treehouse-3-million. Captcha Submit 
Treehouse will be donating $3 million worth of online tech education accounts to 2,500 college students. Through these donated Treehouse accounts, we hope to educate the next generation of designers, coders and educators. 
Secondary education in the US is at an all-time high, and tuition is only increasing. Treehouse is creating this scholarship because we believe in the power of self-learning and self-improvement. We’re giving away 2,500, 2-year long Treehouse subscriptions to students that are passionate about the web. 
If you meet the following criteria, please fill out the form below! U.S. College Student Has a valid .edu e-mail address Loves learning! 
We’ll be taking applications until 9/19! The first 2,500 applicants with valid .edu accounts will be notified via e-mail on 9/26! 
Here’s the form: 
If you have any questions, please feel free to leave a comment on this post or contact one of our community managers: or . 
Best of luck to everyone! Cheers. 
-Treehouse 2 Responses to “Treehouse Donates $3 Million Worth of Tech Education to 2,500 College Students” John Lee 
Hi, 
This is John an international student from Canada. 
I really would want to learn how to code however, learning how to code with team treehouse comes at a hefty price tag that I just can’t quite afford. 
I was wondering if there are student discounts available for international students to have access to great resources to learn how to code? 
-John
